DOC.criteria: Have stable ( within 0.5 percent ( % ) last measure ) glycated hemoglobin ( HbA1c ) < 9.0 % Have stable ( within 30 % ) basal insulin dose 0.2 1.0 unit per kilogram per day ( U/kg/day ) total daily insulin dose ( basal + prandial/bolus ) < 1.5 unit per kilogram ( U/kg ) Have Cpeptide < 0.3 nanomoles per liter ( nmol/L ) Are able willing eat protocol specify standard breakfast meal require Have correct QT interval ( QTc ) prolongation > 500 millisecond ( m ) abnormality 12 lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) , opinion investigator , increase risk associate participate study Have abnormal blood pressure determine investigator Have history presence cardiovascular , respiratory , hepatic , renal , gastrointestinal , endocrine ( apart Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus [ T1DM ] ) , hematological , neurological disorder Have fast triglyceride ( TGs ) > 400 milligram per deciliter ( mg/dL ) ( 4.52 micromoles per liter [ mmol/L ] ) Have use systemic corticosteroid within 4 week prior randomization Currently receive insulin pump insulin degludec Have poorly control diabetes know poor awareness hypoglycemia Have history gastroparesis gastrointestinal malabsorption Require treatment drug insulin treat diabetes Have previous history proliferative retinopathy
